Subject: Re: Hot Rod vs. Motor Master
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Being flipped on to his back just enrages Motormaster, he gets to one knee
to face his opponent, and sees that his back is turned. He lunges at him
trying to grapple his waist and bring him down.
